(I agree with everyone.  One may argue that after "Code of Hero" the Humans 
seemed very close to home, but remember what Inferno said in "The Agenda-Part 
1:"
"The human tribes are scattered.")
::Torca is extremely irritated by Tigerhawk's lack of response::
Torca: Fine then, I'll make my own plan.
::He storms away::
